body: I think I will just enforce that input_names/output_names must be a valid C identifier. That makes sure it is not equal to a number-based thing, and we can make our uniqueName insert a non-identifier character to prevent overlap with debugNames as well.
body_html: I think I will just enforce that input_names/output_names must be a valid C identifier. That makes sure it is not equal to a number-based thing, and we can make our uniqueName insert a non-identifier character to prevent overlap with debugNames as well.
body_text: I think I will just enforce that input_names/output_names must be a valid C identifier. That makes sure it is not equal to a number-based thing, and we can make our uniqueName insert a non-identifier character to prevent overlap with debugNames as well.
